name: Senpai Teaches Me Japanese: Part 1
description: Have you ever wanted to learn Japanese ? This visual novel boasts quick and easy learning in a fun environment, making this is a great place to start !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Practically anything Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: not required Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 11 Processor: Intel-i9900k or better (not really) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: RTX 3090 Ti+ (also not really) Storage: 1 GB available space
